name: Bibimbap
description: Mixed rice with assorted vegetables, gochujang optional.

name: Kimchi Jjigae
description: Spicy kimchi stew often with pork and tofu.

name: Sundubu Jjigae
description: Soft tofu stew with chili and mushrooms; seafood/pork variants exist.

name: Japchae
description: Stir-fried glass noodles with vegetables and soy sauce.

name: Tteokbokki
description: Chewy rice cakes in spicy-sweet gochujang sauce.

name: Jajangmyeon
description: Wheat noodles with savory black bean sauce (often with pork cubes).

name: Jjamppong
description: Spicy seafood noodle soup with chili broth.

name: Samgyeopsal
description: Grilled pork belly served with lettuce wraps and sauces.

name: Bulgogi
description: Marinated grilled beef with soy, garlic, and a hint of sweetness.

name: Galbi
description: Marinated beef short ribs char-grilled.

name: Dakgalbi
description: Spicy stir-fried chicken with vegetables.

name: Kimchi
description: Fermented napa cabbage with chili, garlic, ginger.

name: Kimbap
description: Rice roll with vegetables, egg, and sometimes fish or meat.

name: Naengmyeon
description: Cold buckwheat noodles in chilled broth (summer favorite).

name: Seolleongtang
description: Milky beef bone soup with noodles or rice.

name: Samgyetang
description: Whole young chicken ginseng soup.

name: Budae Jjigae
description: Hearty 'army base' stew with sausages, spam, noodles, kimchi.

name: Haemul Pajeon
description: Crispy scallion pancake with mixed seafood.

name: Hoddeok
description: Sweet filled pancakes with brown sugar syrup and nuts.

name: Bingsu
description: Shaved ice dessert with toppings (fruit, red beans, milk).

name: Tteokguk
description: Rice cake soup traditionally eaten on Lunar New Year.

name: Sundea
description: Blood sausage steamed and sliced, often with salt or sauce.

name: Gyeran-mari
description: Rolled omelette side dish with vegetables.

name: Yangnyeom Chicken
description: Crispy fried chicken with sweet-spicy sauce.

name: Ganjang Gejang
description: Raw crab marinated in soy sauce, umami-rich.

name: Makgeolli
description: Traditional rice brew; often paired with pancakes.

name: Patbingsu
description: Shaved ice with sweet red beans and toppings.

name: Bossam
description: Boiled pork belly slices served with wraps and condiments.

name: Doenjang Jjigae
description: Fermented soybean paste stew with tofu and vegetables.

name: Odeng / Eomuk
description: Fish cake skewers served in warm broth.
